text:
@marcorubio @GovRonDeSantis Little Marco (remember who gave you that name?) Why is Florida hiding the true numbers about covid-19 and infections???
How can you and Desantis sleep at night? Do you have a conscience? And of course you always serve your owners'.... the NRA!
